channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 瑞银将英国央行降息预期从 5 月推迟至 8 月

item.title: 观看：政府数据显示，日本经济避免了技术性衰退，尽管第四季度的上行变化弱于预期，并凸显了对经济复苏乏力的担忧
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's economy avoided a technical recession, revised government data, even though the upward change in the fourth quarter was weaker than expected and highlighted concerns about the sluggish economic recovery https://t.co/YE7KRlwJDj pic.twitter.com/9ASwIJOiBb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：Brian Keene、Abdi Nazemian 和 Stewart O'Nan 三位著名作家起诉 Nvidia 公司，声称他们的作品是由大约 196,640 本书籍组成的数据集的一部分，而该数据集帮助训练 NeMo 人工智能平台模拟普通书面语言。
item.description:
WATCH: Three prominent authors, Brian Keene, Abdi Nazemian and Stewart O'Nan, have sued Nvidia and claimed that their works were part of a dataset of about 196,640 books that helped train the NeMo AI platform to simulate ordinary written language https://t.co/0rx2ehsjW3 pic.twitter.com/JDs183fr0i

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看：修订后的国内生产总值（GDP）数据显示，日本经济在 10 月至 12 月间增长了 0.4%，从而避免了经济衰退。然而，新数据远低于预期
item.description:
WATCH: Japan has dodged a recession as revised GDP numbers showed the economy growing 0.4% over the October-December quarter. However, the new figure well below forecasts https://t.co/YE7KRlwbNL pic.twitter.com/xIsYRpbxiP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着英国购物者每周都试图进一步压缩开支，超市龙头企业乐购（Tesco）和塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）正利用其强大的财力，从负债累累、难以与之抗衡的竞争对手手中赢得顾客。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
As British shoppers try to stretch their spending further each week, supermarket leaders Tesco and Sainsbury's are using their superior financial firepower to win over customers from debt-laden rivals struggling to compete. More here: https://t.co/x0c25lbulE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 独家：投资者希望 Zara 所有者 Inditex 效仿竞争对手 H&M 和 Primark，公布其全部供应商名单，以便他们更好地评估供应链风险。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Investors want Zara owner Inditex to follow rivals H&M and Primark in making its full list of suppliers public so they can better assess any supply chain risks. More here: https://t.co/1YSojmtCgF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 大量人工智能初创企业的涌入使欧洲的技术人才争夺战日趋白热化，谷歌 DeepMind 等公司不得不在支付高额费用或失去该地区最优秀人才之间做出选择。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
An influx of artificial intelligence startups is heating up the battle for technical talent in Europe, leaving companies like Google DeepMind to choose between paying big or losing out on the region's best minds. More here: https://t.co/YXrFw63rE2

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在特斯拉（Tesla）与澳大利亚汽车游说团断绝关系几天后，澳大利亚大众汽车公司（Volkswagen Australia）表示已退出该国汽车游说团的政策制定委员会。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Volkswagen Australia said it had quit the policymaking committee at the country's auto lobby, days after Tesla cut ties with the group, as the German carmaker distances itself from a campaign against new fuel standards. More here: https://t.co/MPwizgFHuR

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）正率领一个总统贸易和投资代表团访问菲律宾，以加强美国与整个地区的经济联系。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
US Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo is leading a presidential trade and investment mission to the Philippines as the United States looks to fortify economic ties across the region. More here: https://t.co/TngRDqqPfV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国的目标是成为印度洋-太平洋地区的 "首选经济伙伴"--雷蒙多
item.description:
US aims to be 'economic partner of choice' for Indo-Pacific- Raimondo https://t.co/5MU0XG9gKv pic.twitter.com/tIk8LDsa5M

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 独家报道中国监管机构最近与金融机构会面，讨论国家支持的房地产开发商中国万科的问题，要求大型银行加强融资支持，并要求私人债务持有人讨论延长期限的问题。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Chinese regulators recently met financial institutions to discuss state-backed property developer China Vanke where they asked large banks to enhance financing support and asked private debt holders to discuss maturity extension. More here: https://t.co/ccdBtOq2BY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 11, 2024

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司表示，在美国司法部对 1 月份一架波音 737 MAX 飞机在飞行途中发生爆炸展开刑事调查后，该公司正在与司法部合作。
item.description:
Alaska Airlines said it is cooperating with the Justice Department after it opened a criminal investigation into the Boeing 737 MAX blowout during a flight in January https://t.co/u09XMYHhLl pic.twitter.com/mQ5whsAdZV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 10, 2024

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）表示，它正在配合美国司法部对波音737 MAX型客机在1月份一次飞行中发生的门板爆裂事件进行刑事调查。
item.description:
Alaska Airlines said it is cooperating with the Justice Dept. in its criminal investigation into the Boeing 737 MAX door-panel blowout during a flight in January https://t.co/u09XMYHPAT pic.twitter.com/8e5HtLq8Px

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：萨姆-奥特曼将重返 OpenAI 董事会。对阿尔特曼 11 月被解雇事件的调查已经结束，该公司表示已经制定了新的治理规则，并加强了利益冲突政策。
item.description:
WATCH: Sam Altman will return to OpenAI's board. An investigation into the events surrounding Altman's November firing concluded, and the company said it has created new governance rules and strengthened its conflict-of-interest policy https://t.co/qOL8LRDd6P pic.twitter.com/SN6rVwcmiZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：全球葡萄酒消费量的下降对澳大利亚的打击尤为严重，因为作为其最大产品的廉价红葡萄酒的需求萎缩最快。作为世界第五大葡萄酒出口国，澳大利亚在 2023 年中期的葡萄酒储量超过 20 亿升。
item.description:
WATCH: Falling consumption of wine worldwide has hit Australia particularly hard as demand shrinks fastest for the cheaper reds that are its biggest product. The world's fifth-largest exporter of wine had more than 2 billion liters in storage in mid-2023 https://t.co/eCVXTIQLhG pic.twitter.com/pGprYQ90OE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）将与三位新董事一起重返 ChatGPT 制造商的董事会
item.description:
WATCH: OpenAI Chief Executive Sam Altman will return to the ChatGPT-maker's board along with three new directors https://t.co/qOL8LRDd6P pic.twitter.com/caUOuhlOph

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 观看：澳大利亚数百万棵葡萄树被毁，还有数千万棵葡萄树必须拔除，以控制过量生产，因为过量生产已经压低了葡萄价格，威胁到种植者和葡萄酒酿造者的生计。
item.description:
WATCH: Millions of vines are being destroyed in Australia and tens of millions more must be pulled up to rein in overproduction that has crushed grape prices and threatened the livelihoods of growers and wine makers https://t.co/eCVXTIRj7e pic.twitter.com/lRc9ZClBGl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024

item.title: 华尔街周五收盘下跌，S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数在盘中触及纪录高点后出现逆转。更多信息
item.description:
Wall Street closed lower on Friday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq reversing course after touching record highs during the session. Read more https://t.co/S786b4i6HE pic.twitter.com/8uSU32yZtZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 9, 2024
